sections.background: a library to manipulate graph databases and perform computations. GraphX unifies ETL (Extract, Transform, and Load) process, exploratory analysis, and iterative graph computation within a single system.

metadata.concept_definition: a library to manipulate graph databases and perform computations. GraphX unifies ETL (Extract, Transform, and Load) process, exploratory analysis, and iterative graph computation within a single system.
